comment: really chill overall, most ppl stopped showing up during the semester bust you can still end with an A without going. class was irl but tests were in person w/ no lockdown or camera. some tests were deff easier than others but class is chill
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: (COn bio)McElroy is very relaxed, caring and also has a unique perspective on a lot of science topics specifically he brings nauce to some older biology 'rules'. I will so one issue I had is he is sort of unorganized with assignments and grading. I wished I had a clear syllabus.

Super chill guy, lets you leave really early. The lab itself sucked because of how boring it was (it felt like it lowkey had nothing to do with the lecture). But he was very willing to help. Whenever i would ask him a question he would just straight up give me the answer which was nice. def take him if you want an easy lab.

He's a very chill teacher; he goes over the instructions for the lab in the beginning, and then he'll leave you and your group alone for the rest of the class to work on the assignment. He's very attentive and he'll answer every question you have. He's also very lenient on deadlines, all you have to do is ask
Very interesting class. The professor is very laid back and understanding.

Great lab professor! He cares about his students and understands we have a busy life so he will sometimes extend deadlines. He will help you as long as you ask and always respects us and our time. I would take him if you have the chance because he is super funny, caring, and overall a great professor!

Dr. McElroy is an exceptional professor. He views students as young scholars and greatly cares about their successes. He's an accomplished researcher and mentor and is highly influential in his students' development as scientists. There are many reasons why he's an awesome professor, but he is foremost a superb person--the rest follows.
Great lab teacher.

I loved taking McElroy this summer. It was a fun learning environment and he made the material easier to understand and digest without dragging out the content. Most classes we were wrapped up well before the class was suppose to end. He is a fun guy who is down to earth and enjoys what he teaches. The tests aren't bad either.

Dr. McElroy is easily one of the best bio professors I've ever head. He's smart, kind, and always willing to help. He made the class as easy as he could and tried to keep it enjoyable. Super easy maymester: 2 exams, 7 case studies (easy, some we did in class), and a powerpoint presentation. All super easy. Tests are online, non-lockdown/open note.

Fantastic professor to take for a stress free elective during a maymester! All you have to do is show up to class, complete the assignments, and youll pass! The exams come straight from the power points and case study worksheets. Very kind and knowledgeable about forensic science. Highly recommend!

Professor McElroy is phenomenal for HGE. He let us practically make our own tests by submitting questions and then he made the take-home test from our submission. The questions are not super easy, but he is willing to help you out through email. He is a nice guy and wants the best for his students.

Dr. McElroy is a wonderful prof and person in general. He will help you for literally anything science related, it doesn't even have to be about his class. If he knows how to help you out he will. His tests are not easy peasy but they aren't super difficult either. Just show up to class, take notes, study and you should do fine.

I cannot agree more with the other ratings. He is easier than other biology electives, but that is because he cares more in my opinion. He is intent on you learning and not memorizing, and he gives you so many opportunities to learn. I love him and am taking him again next semester. No quizzes, long take-home midterm/final, in-class stuff. TAKE!!!

Took as a maymester and he's very chill. There were two tests, one group project, and 7 case studies. Easy grader and the tests were open note and came straight from his ppts. Easy A for a maymester class.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Group projects--Lecture heavy

comment: WOW! I cannot stress this enough, BEST PROFESSOR EVER. I took him for evolutionary bio, and yes the test were semi-difficult but his lectures were interesting, he only cares that you leave the class having learnt something. No extra credit, but he does allow you to dispute in office hours why you have choose the incorrect answer, for points back.
Dr. McElroy is awesome he literally is so chill, but he genuinely wants everyone to learn something and is more than willing to help students be successful in his class
Chillest dude ever. All he cares about is that you at least try to learn something and work safely. I dont think theres a more chill level of chill than this guy.

Dr. McElroy is a great choice for Bio 1 lab. He is laid back and willing to answer any question. His grading is fair and he's happy to look at lab reports before they are turned in to point out any errors.
He is so nice and funny, he really tries to help you.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: This is a great professor. Very down to earth, helpful, and nice person. He is very willing to help students and answer questions. He is very understanding of individual situations. A cool guy in general I would definitely recommend this professor.

This was my second time taking him, bottom line is he's really nice, won't talk down to you, offers research involvements (if you ask) and doesn't assign busy work. He gives few graded projects/tests/assignments but is a fairly easy grader. Book needed for take home exams.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: Lectures are hit and miss good. Also hit and miss on if he posts them. Suggest going to class, tests can be tricky, must know your stuff. lots of 'none of the above' / 'all of the above' / 'a and c only' ect answer choices. Really willing to help and wants students to be inspired

He is a great professor, but his exams are tough!  Make sure you study a LOT! Attendance is necessary to pass. I missed some classes and regretted it the next lecture. Study guides are provided and he is super helpful! There are three lecture exams and a cumulative final. I studied my butt off, but just missed making a B. Study & you'll be set!

Tests vary in difficulty but are all doable with studying and attendance. No book. Awkward but hilarious and kind, wont make you feel stupid. Gives some extra credit. Take him for any class and you will enjoy it. 4 tests and some extra credit is your final grade..

Dr. McElroy is a great professor. Evolutionary biology is a tough subject to begin with, but he makes the material understandable and enjoyable. If you don't understand certain material just ask him for help! He is very approachable. Study guides are provided for the exams. 4 exams total(final included) I'm glad I took his class
Dr. McElroy is very approachable. He is funny and a great teacher. The class is interesting. Take him if you can.

Horrible teacher!!!!! Hard tests!!!! 55/70 people failed  his 2nd test by a land slide ((30s and 40s)) and even after he admitted to making it too difficult still kept the failing tests on our records with no extra credit nor any help to improve the grade!!

Phenomenal teacher. I hate biology and he made me like going to his class. Funny guy. Very approachable, very helpful. Tests are straight from notes, don't bother with the book. Highly highly recommend him to anyone!

He was the best. The tests were completely from the notes. Make sure you know them. He does make you memorize the phylums, but ones you have it down, you're good. He's super nice and really helpful. He's a great person too. Don't use the textbook at all.

Great Teacher!!!! Very helpful willing to meet up and talk about class notes if unclear. Test are 90% open ended. So study. Dont buy the book!!!! He literally writes all notes on the board. Fun teacher but the 8:00am class was a drag

Because of the snow storm, we had 2 exams and 1 final instead of 3 exams and 1 final. Exams are MC and it's not hard at all. GO TO CLASS cos his exams come from his notes which he writes on the board. If you get confused, look at the book. Graphs and tables on the exam come from the book. EASY class!

Best professor ever! He doesn't hold your hand during lab like other bio labs, which I loved. 2 take home exams, 5 case reports, random hwk assignments and 1 presentation/lab report. Very fair grader and very funny/interesting. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

Very good professor, but I don't recommend taking him early in the morning because it can be hard to pay attention. Tests are straight from lecture, so you have to take very good notes. He tells you not to read the book unless you don't understand something in lecture, because there's too much information in it. Lab was very easy. Very laid back.

Highly recommended! He only tests you over material from lecture, so you need to go to class. He makes lecture interesting and is a very good teacher. He teaches old school, talking and whiteboard, if you like that kind of thing (Never uses powerpoint). This class is alot of memorizing, but McElroy is the best professor for this class.
Awesome teacher, doesn't make you feel stressed if your a science/math major.  Test based on lecture, not manatory, but VERY useful. Great guy and always there to help students, def take him!
lab reports are easy. take lecture notes and study them. the tests are confusing because the wording is different from the text and notes. lots of info to know for the tests.

Awesome teacher! Definitely recommend him to anyone. He is VERY helpful and always willing to explain notes. He gives notes in class on the board so it's mandatory to go to class, but it isn't bad at all because he makes class interesting, funny guy. I look forward to every class of his. Test aren't bad either, just study EVERYTHING in the notes.
Excellent professor! Very helpful.

Dr. McElroy is a funny guy who looks like Robin Williams. Lectures are interesting but the tests are a little difficult and hard to understand. In order to make an 'a' on a  test you have to really read the book
great guy. seems like its gonna be an easy class, but dont underestimate the material! his tests are pretty difficult! hes a pretty funny teacher!

Dr. McElroy rocks!  He looks like Robin Williams, and is so much fun.  I LOVED his class, and he actually made me change what area I want to study in grad school.  The tests are difficult, but if you read and come to class, you'll be fine.  This is the kind of teacher you want to have a beer with after class :)
The class was difficult for me.
A difficult professor. Test were  somewhat confusing. However, he tried to make class interesting.
Test were extremely. Not much help when you need help understanding the material.

Great guy. Dr. McElroy truly deserves the positive ratings. Funny, understands students, explains everything well, lectures well; it would be pretty hard not to like the guy. For this course attendance is mandatory. The course is easy but you do have to study.

Take his class!!! This is an easy class, but you still learn something. Tests are easy and all multiple choice, and final is optional as long as you are satisfied with your grade. Labs are boring, but oh well. His lab quizzes are harder than his tests but they are still pretty easy as long as you do the lab. He is awesome!

OMG! If u miss getting into his class, skip d course for next semester!!! If u fail this class, u r not worthy 2 be in college! Just go 2 class & listen 2 him go over slides which he leaves online 4 referencing. Do ur LABS...u can't do good in d lab exam w/o going 2 d LAB!!! Has a great sense of humour. Do not miss d revision b4 d exam.

all you have to do is print the lectures on line and read the chapter. i went to class (optional) for a few weeks, but it was pretty boring and pointless since it's online. so, just show up for the tests and if you make grades you like on the first 3 you can exempt the final. the labs suck but are easy but the lab quizzes are harder then the tests!
He's a really good teacher. He knows what he's talking about. Fun & interesting guy. I'd definitely recommend him.

I love this guy! I      science but he made it fun. You don't have to go to class, but you get more out of it if you do, he makes it interesting. Make sure to at least look over the labs if you don't do them for the quizzes. You get to drop your lowest test grade including the final... definitely recommend him! I would take him again.

McElroy rocks out!!!! Attendance isnt necessary since his lectures are online, but I go to that class just to hear him teach, because he is very witty (not in the cheesey dumb way, cause EVERYONE laughs)and he incorporates it into his lectures. TAKE HIM!!
Very easy.  Notes online and easy tests.  If you don't know or don't care about science, take him cause he makes it kind of funny.
No Comments

Just read the notes he puts online and you will do fine.  Basically a repeat of high school science so it is pretty easy.  Quiz on lab assignments and you get to drop your lowest test grade.  Cummm. final but you can drop that as your lowest grade

Puts lectures on line, you can drop lowest test grade, even if it is the final.  Doesn't test on anything that isn't in the notes.  Going to class is not manditory. I'm not interested in science but I really liked his class

Nice Prof willing to help if you need it. Nop attendance policy, puts lectures online. Labs are pretty boring(but part of all SCI 1101 classes)don't have to hand them in,just take a quiz on them. I had to study for the quiz and test & did well on them. Get to drop lowest test grade (could be final)
